anthar pasal krikat awurudu 15n pahala thewani kotase awasan maha tharagaya kolambaa aananda widuhal 'si' kandayama ha kirindiwala madhya maha widuhala athara kambal pedesa kridanganaye di ada pawathweyi.awasan purwa tharagaye di kolambaa aananda widuhala wethin weyangoda bandaranayaka madhya maha widuhala parajayata pathwu athara kirindiwala madhya maha widuhala wethin panadura shri sumangala widuhala parajaya wiya.ardha awasan wataye di aananda widuhala wethin enderamulla santha joshap widuhala da, kirindiwala madi widuhala wethin galla richmand widuhala da parajayata pathwiya.kolambaa aananda widuhal 15n pahala ‘si’ kandayama mihisara hettiaarachchi wisin da, kirindiwala madhya maha widuhal pila pansilu deshan wisin da meheyawanu labayi.aananda ‘si’ pila :-mihisara hettiaarachchi (nayaka), gishan wishwajith, sachith liyanage, purna withanage, tharusha wijerathna, weron santhush, pasan jayasinha, dinuka prathibha, sudila sandesh, shehan dilsara, dishal da silwa, kawindu madhushan, thisara santhush, dilesh rajakarunarathna, daminda roshan, dilshan dhananjaya, dimuth wijerathna, pramuditha thilakarathnakirindiwala ma.ma.wi.:- pansilu deshan (nayaka), kasun sandaruwan, samith harshitha, chathura madhusankha, kawishka nimsara, ashen thimod, damith chamal, kawindu madhusankha, bishan himath, malindu sanath, malaka wanigasuriya, shenal ransika, nipun pramod, shanuka madhushan, ranila kumara, isuru dhananjaya.
